content.name: hat
content.label: Hat/Cap
content.gloss: a shaped covering for the head worn for warmth, as a fashion item, or as part of a uniform

content.name: crown
content.label: Crown
content.gloss: the top part of the hat that covers your head

content.name: band
content.label: Band
content.gloss: a strap or cord on the hat, usually for decoration or frame the shape of the hat

content.name: decoration
content.label: Decoration
content.gloss: other decorative parts, such as a star, or a toy

content.name: cap
content.label: Cap
content.gloss: a kind of soft, flat hat without a brim, and sometimes having a visor

content.name: bill
content.label: Bill
content.gloss: a stiff brim at the front of a cap

content.name: panel
content.label: Panel
content.gloss: a top part of cap where you wear cap on your head

content.name: button
content.label: Button
content.gloss: a button on top of the panel

content.name: strap
content.label: Strap
content.gloss: a strap at the back of a cap that is used to adjust the size of the cap
